title: Sources: Clippers trading center Ivica Zubac to Pacers
desc: The Clippers are trading center Ivica Zubac to the Pacers in exchange for Bennedict Mathurin, Isaiah Jackson, Indiana's protected 2026 first-round pick and unprotected 2029 first-round pick

title: The Olympic Torch Relay makes a stop at the Milano Cortina 2026 competition venues.
desc: On its way to the grand finale on February 6th, the Flame visited the venues of Milan Cortina 2026: from the Milan Ice Park in Rho to the Ice Skating Arena in Assago, and on to Santagiulia and the Olympic Village.

title: Arinaitwe Rugyendo: Intellectual Who Fought History, Built Institutions and Returned to Scholarship with Honour!
desc: Choosing Makerere University over the cassock was not a retreat from vocation but a redirection toward a broader apostolate: the public square.

title: RCMP investigating discovery of human remains southwest of Calgary
desc: Investigators with RCMP major crimes have been called in following the discovery of human remains in a burned-out vehicle near Eden Valley, Alta.

title: Marco Sturm: Hit to Charlie McAvoy's head 'pisses me off'
desc: Marco Sturm was not a fan of the hit to Charlie McAvoy's head in the Bruins-Panthers game on Wednesday night.

title: Neocities founder stuck in chatbot hell after Bing blocked 1.5 million sites
desc: Microsoft won’t explain why Bing blocked 1.5 million Neocities websites.

title: Alex Eala suffers singles disappointment at Abu Dhabi Open but marches on in doubles with Janice Tjen
desc: Despite a singles loss, Alex Eala can continue to shine at the Abu Dhabi Open -- alongside fellow Southeast Asian star Janice Tjen in doubles.
